name: Midnight Cemetery - Virtual Tour
description: The Midnight Cemetery - Virtual tour is a new way of experiencing art in the current digital domain. Produced by Adrian Tabacaru and Costin Chioreanu, this exhibition can be explored as a Virtual Reality Tour using a dedicated VR-Headset, or as a standalone PC Game. Your goal is to find the exit and return back to life, but while you are here, you are invited to take your time to explore this suspended space surrounded by mysterious characters frozen in time. At the end of this experience, you will be guided to the "Afterlife Romance"official page where you can listen to the album that inspired this exhibition.
